medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ)
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The RLQ pain began around noon today and is constant. No nausea or vomiting, but the patient reports chills and has been passing regular bowel movements and flatus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, seasonal; Polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS); Obstructive sleep apnea, not on CPAP; Hyperlipidemia; History of right renal mass (angiomyolipoma); History of leukocytosis; Fatty liver with cholelithiasis.
medical_history.family_history: Father living with prostate cancer, hyperlipidemia, and obesity; mother living with a history of colonic polyps and hyperlipidemia; sisters living with obesity; paternal grandmother deceased of ovarian cancer; maternal grandfather deceased of colon cancer; paternal grandfather deceased of stroke.
